version_description:
Flexi Cards/Packs are our strongest Cards/Packs ever for Hala & Hala Go Customers.
Available in four denominations. Customers get points on activation which can be used for International calls & SMS, Local calls & SMS and Local data.
We are always enhancing our app to make your experience better
We are always enhancing our app to make your experience better

This latest version of the Ooredoo App has been designed to make your life easier than ever when it comes to your Ooredoo services.

The Ooredoo App now includes an Enhanced Dashboard, Quick Access feature, Smartwatch Sync and more!

Update your Ooredoo App today!

We are always enhancing our app to make your experience better

- IPhone X related bug fixes.
- UI improvements.

We are always enhancing our app to make your experience better

- PUK Retrieval is now available on Ooredoo app.
- Bug fixes

Yet again some exciting updates for Ooredoo Users

1. Tap up Game - Tap away and win some exciting gifts and rewards.
2. Ooredoo 5G is ready and officially First in the world to launch commercially. Opt into 5G through Ooredoo App.
3. Added support for iOS 13

Many more enhancements and bug fixes to improve your experience and the performance of the app. We're constantly working on our app experience.

We are always enhancing our app to make your experience better

- Bug fixes
We have revamped the help section now it's​ easier to get in touch with us with our updated Live chat feature.
Minor bug fixes

We made some updates on the Nojoom section:
- Now you can easily enroll in the Nojoom program.
- Track your Nojoom point expiry.
- Update your Nojoom contact details (if required).

We are always enhancing our app to make your experience better.
- Bug fixes

We are always enhancing our app to make your experience better.
. Look forward for Wednesday Walk Rewards on the Ooredoo App

Yet again Ooredoo Qatar presents new exciting digital experiences through our mobile app. Inspired by our customers, here are a few new ways to celebrate this Ramadan.
1. Introducing new and exciting offers in our Ooredoo Goodies section, make sure you check it out.
2. Easy Transfers - Now recharge for friends and family using your Hala/Shahry service numbers.
3. eSIM Enhancements - Easy to Add eSIM profile to supported devices (iPhone XS, iPhone XS Max, 2018 iPad Pro, 2019 iPad mini and 2019 iPad Air) and activation directly from the app's SIM management Section.
Improved performance and minor bug fixes.

Ooredoo Qatar is constantly working on giving customers new exciting digital experiences through our mobile app. Inspired by response from our earlier release, we have

1. Weekends Ramadan Surprise - Scan Ooredoo banners and win exciting gifts.

2. UI Enhancements and bug fixes in an attempt to improve enhance the experience and improve the performance of the app.

We're constantly working on our app experience and welcome feedback from our users

At Ooredoo Qatar, we are celebrating the Nojoom 10th Anniversary (May 29th – 31st) it’s been ten years of rewarding our customers with amazing deals by our exclusive partners. Make sure you tune in to the app during our celebrations to join the festivities and claim your gifts.

Our customer support team is now happy to provide support using your favorite secure messaging application (WhatsApp); the help section is always one click away to message us.

UI Enhancements and bug fixes in an attempt to improve enhance the experience and improve the performance of the app. We're continually working on our app experience and welcome feedback from our users.
UI enhancements and bug fixes to improve your experience and the performance of the app. We're constantly working on our app experience and welcome feedback from our users.

- Fixed a bug that prevented some users from unsubscribing from Add-ons.
- Fixed a bug on Nojoom section.
- Added support for Philippines Keys and Packs.

The famous Hala flexi just became more flexible like never before. Allocate flexi points to your convenience for local and International calls/SMS and local data.

The flexibility is amazing and the prices are even better!

Why is Flexi Card so good?
Full flexibility with self-allocation of points.
Amazing rates
No contract, no commitment
You can check the balance and allocate via Ooredoo App.

UI enhancements and bug fixes to improve your experience and the performance of the app. We're constantly working on our app experience and welcome feedback from our users.

1. Tap up Game - Tap away and win some exciting gifts and rewards.
2. Ooredoo 5G is ready and officially First in the world to launch commercially. Opt into 5G through Ooredoo App.
3. Added support for iOS 13

Many more enhancements and bug fixes to improve your experience and the performance of the app. We're constantly working on our app experience.

It’s all new and exciting at Ooredoo! Check out our new QATARNA 5G plans packed with awesome benefits:

- With unlimited internet you’ll never run out of data
- Boosted roaming allowances will allow you to stay connected across the globe
- All new plans are now loaded with 100 international minutes
- Enjoy free benefits; get access to your favourite sports and football leagues on beIN CONNECT, premium video content and thousands of discounts across the city.

upgrade your existing plan via the Ooredoo App.

Enjoy secured Bill payment, Recharges, Easy transfer, Balance check and more in just a few taps.

#StaySafeatHome with Ooredoo App. Your one stop solution.

Ooredoo App is updated regularly and at ooredoo we strive to bring your Safety & Security first. Here whats new:
1. Introducing OTP Authentication for Easy Transfer.
2. Exciting & Exclusive Offers.
3. Improved Performance and Features.
4. Bug Fixes

Feel free to write to us your feedback.

We’re introducing a new page for post-paid customers to change or upgrade their plans with quick and easy
steps!
To find the new page, simply;

1. Open the landing page and tap on your main number
2. Tap ‘Subscriptions’
3. Under ‘My subscriptions’, tap ‘Manage’ then ‘Change plan’
